Question: Wanxinda (Guangzhou) Technology Product Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Wanxinda (Guangzhou) Technology Product Co., Ltd

Product: Eco-friendly Laptop bag/backpack

- Eco-friendly design
- Suitable for tablets or laptops
- Water-repellent and anti-theft features
- Business and commuting bag
- ISO certified factory
- Offers various bags and luggage suitable for different uses
- Invested in mask production for surgical, medical, and disposable civilian masks
- New factory in Indonesia for computer bags, camera bags, outdoor bags, and more
- Well-received products by global clients such as Tesco, Staples, Carrefour, and Best Buy
Summary_cn:
万信达 (广州) 技术产品有限公司

产品：环保笔记本包/背包

- 环保设计
- 适用于平板电脑或笔记本电脑
- 防水和防盗功能
- 商务和通勤包
- ISO认证工厂
- 提供适用于不同用途的各种包和行李
- 投资于手术、医疗和一次性民用口罩生产
- 在印尼设有新工厂，生产计算机包、相机包、户外包等产品
- 在全球客户中备受欢迎，如Tesco、Staples、Carrefour和Best Buy
